comment.author: Megan
comment.text: How about the nude pics of the wife on the internet? Is this a first lady that can be a role model for our girls? Or would you prefer a classy woman as President? http://nypost.com/2016/08/01/melania-trumps-girl-on-girl-photos-from-racy-shoot-revealed/

replies.author: Corina
replies.text: The nude pics of Obama's mother didn't seem to phase you guys, so what's the big deal now? They are teaching masterbation in our elementary schools, young girls are dressing like hookers like their idol music artists, you are supporting a known liar and woman who victim shamed women who were sexually harassed by her husband and NOW you liberals want to pretend you are worried about role models? Just stop.

replies.author: Megan
replies.text: Your message is garbled. You make no sense at all.

replies.author: Corina
replies.text: It isn't garbled. You just have an aversion to truth.
